mapper.insert:
insert into station_info
station_info.full_name,
station_info.input_code,
station_info.is_delete,
station_info.job_type,
station_info.operator,
station_info.short_name,
station_info.station_code,
station_info.station_grade,
station_info.station_type,
station_info.status,
station_info.ternout_num,
station_info.thigh_track_num,
station_info.track_division_id, station_info.create_time
values
#{fullName},
#{inputCode},
#{isDelete},
#{jobType},
#{operator},
#{shortName},
#{stationCode},
#{stationGrade},
#{stationType},
#{status},
#{ternoutNum},
#{thighTrackNum},
#{trackDivisionId}, current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update station_info
station_info.full_name = #{FullName},
station_info.input_code = #{InputCode},
station_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
station_info.job_type = #{JobType},
station_info.operator = #{Operator},
station_info.short_name = #{ShortName},
station_info.station_code = #{StationCode},
station_info.station_grade = #{StationGrade},
station_info.station_type = #{StationType},
station_info.status = #{Status},
station_info.ternout_num = #{TernoutNum},
station_info.thigh_track_num = #{ThighTrackNum},
station_info.track_division_id = #{TrackDivisionId}
station_info.update_time= current_timestamp
station_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select station_info.create_time, station_info.full_name, station_info.id, station_info.input_code, station_info.is_delete, station_info.job_type, station_info.operator, station_info.short_name, station_info.station_code, station_info.station_grade, station_info.station_type, station_info.status, station_info.ternout_num, station_info.thigh_track_num, station_info.track_division_id, station_info.update_time form station_info
station_info.id = #{id}
